NIGHT WALK (2019)
Originaltitel: Night Walk
Mit: Sean Stone; Sarah Alami; Laouni Mouhid, Mickey Rourke
Regie: Aziz Tazi
FSK: Freigegeben ab 16 Jahren

INHALTSANGABE:
In diesem modernen Romeo und Julia werden die beiden Liebenden durch die kulturellen Spannungen zwischen Ost und West auseinandergerissen. Sarah nimmt ihren amerikanischen Freund Frank mit in ihr Heimatland in der arabischen Welt. Nach einem Zwischenfall bei einem nÃ¤chtlichen Spaziergang wird Frank von der korrupten Polizei wegen Mordes an Sarah verhaftet. Seine Suche nach Gerechtigkeit wird zu einer spirituellen Reise, die von muslimischen Insassen angefÃ¼hrt wird, vom gemÃ¤ÃŸigten Konvertiten bis hin zu Fundamentalisten, die dem Terror anhÃ¤ngen.

metadata.Plot: A charming ladies' man, Frank has no intention of settling down. That's until he meets a beautiful and intelligent Arab woman, Sarah, one incandescent night. Their romance takes off and Frank decides to propose to Sarah during a journey in her home country. One night abroad, corrupt Arab police discover the couple in a compromising situation. They provoke an incident that snowballs. As the protagonists try to escape, the police open fire, accidentally killing Sarah. Fearful of an international backlash, the police frame Frank for murder, aided by a crooked American judge, with his own selfish business motives. The judge summons Frank back to the U.S. to serve his unjust sentence. Assaulted as soon as he arrives in prison, Frank is saved by his cellmate Ayman, a moderate Muslim convert who unwillingly enrolls him in the powerful gang of Muslim fundamentalists he uses for his own protection. Desperate to prove his innocence, Frank resorts to breaking out of prison to seek revenge on those who destroyed his life.
metadata.Actors: Sean Stone, Sarah Alami, Laouni Mouhid
